name: SonicRitual
0:
”Alexa Open Sonic Ritual”
”Alexa Ask Sonic Ritual to Play Forest”
”Alexa Ask Sonic Ritual to Play Portal”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sonic ritual
des:
Have trouble sleeping? Feeling burned out, emotionally drained, or mentally exhausted? Clear Your Mind with Negative thoughts, We got you! This is the safest place to relax and meditate. The Sonic Ritual application enables you to uncover your innermost feelings of well-being through the noises around you using sound therapy.

Experience the power of meditation, yoga, healing, and health affirmations, along with special white noise, Healing bowls, and Frequency hertz you'll feel the best emotional journey in a beautiful setting.

You'll enter a deep state of relaxation thanks to the vibrations of the music played on the healing bowls.

Sonic Ritual, an integrated health business established in 2022, creates straightforward tools to aid people in regaining their most profound states of well-being. We are introducing additional techniques to holistic health and cutting-edge technology to raise the human mind, informed by both ancient knowledge and current science.


Our objective
By getting more rest, renewal, and meditation, we hope to guide people toward their deepest states of well-being

Features
Over 100 relaxing sounds to choose from
The user can quickly continue a prior session.
The user can listen to audio indefinitely until it stops or pauses.
Uninterrupted listening during track looping, track shuffle, or in between tracks.
Optional Audio Prompts
When a playlist has multiple songs, the next track is always played.
a single song from the playlist will be looped
Loops indefinitely without sound gaps
Tracks are automatically mixed each time a category is chosen.
Healing & Health affirmations
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
